DOC.brief_summary: Purpose of this study is to evaluate stem cell expression (SCE) in endometriotic (E) and non endometriotic ovarian and endometrial tissues.
DOC.brief_title: Edessy Stem Cell Score (ESS), Endometrium, Endometrioma
DOC.detailed_description: This study was conducted on 40 women at Al-Azhar University Hospitals. They are divided into two equal groups, group 1 with ovarian endometrioma and group 2 with normal ovary. Ovarian and endometrial samples were evaluated by hematoxlin & eosin for histopathology (HP) and of oct-4 for immunohistochemistry (IH) for SCE. Evaluation of IH parameters revealed that the most important factors for evaluating SC were arranged as score ( Edessy Stem Cell Score=ESS).
DOC.criteria: 20 to 40 years and did not receive hormonal treatment for three month Diabetes mellitus, cardiovascular and kidney diseases, adenomyosis, Uterine fibroid Endometrial carcinoma and Poly cystic ovary
